thread.title: Back to school for Bradley
thread.title_full: Back to school for Bradley | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Back to school for Bradley
text:
Back to school for County Durham's Bradley Lowery Credit: Bradley's Family The family of Bradley Lowery say for the first time in months, he's felt well enough to go to school.
Five-year-old Bradley's battle with Neuroblastoma touched the hearts of not only the North East but the entire nation.
Since beginning his latest round of cancer treatment, Bradley has felt too unwell to go to school, but on Tuesday morning he returned to Blackhall Colliery Primary School to see his classmates.
In a message on his Facebook page, Bradley Lowery’s Fight Against Neuroblastoma, his mum said:
Bradley has been feeling really well last couple of days and decided he wanted to go to school for a few hours.
He had a lovely time catching up with his friends.
Bradley is back to hospital tomorrow to get his blood checked and to find out when he will be starting the next round of treatment.
Thank you to everyone that is supporting him, it means the world to us.
– Bradley's Mum Bradley Lowery
